channel.title: How do i put an npc pn top pf something?
channel.description:
How do i put an npc pn top of something? Like in Rs there are ninja monkeys on platforms in apetoll. Can someone help me please, its probably something really simple =\
Thanks in Advance

item.title: How do i put an npc pn top pf something?
item.dc:creator: @lunden lunden
item.description:
@lunden wrote:

[quote=“1 0wn3d U I, post:12, topic:228295”]Ty All i have fixed it now =]

It turns out i put in the wron co-ordinates but now i know how to add the others thanks sooo much![/quote]
No problem, glad to help ;p

Read full topic

item.title: How do i put an npc pn top pf something?
item.dc:creator: @lunden lunden
item.description:
@lunden wrote:

[quote=“1 0wn3d U I, post:8, topic:228295”]I did compile, but its still not working would this affect it?
The platform is an object that is actually on runescape[/quote]
The platfom , is height 0
But fix (::noclip) Then walk on it .
Put npc on cord, compile done.

item.title: How do i put an npc pn top pf something?
item.dc:creator: @shnee shnee
item.description:
@shnee wrote:

Open up autospawn.cgf with notepad.exe and find the NPC you wish to put on top of something. Change the height to what you want and go to file Save.

Read full topic
